result.eng: The abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ga: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Lean an saighdiúir tréigthe ag troid go dtí an deireadhThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.
result.ponchtml: Lean an saiġdiúir tréigṫe ag troid go dtí an deireaḋThe abandoned soldier continued fighting until the end.

result.eng: The girl has been abandoned by her lover.
result.ga: Tá an cailín tréigthe ag a leannán
result.orig: Tá an cailín tréigthe ag a leannán
result.html: Tá an cailín tréigthe ag a leannánThe girl has been abandoned by her lover.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cailín tréigṫe ag a leannánThe girl has been abandoned by her lover.

result.eng: We are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibheWe are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid tréigṫe anseo ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeWe are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
